ne14:2.3: Kā ca pakatikathāya desanā, cattāri saccāni.
ne14:2.5: “idaṁ dukkhan”ti ayaṁ paññatti pañcannaṁ khandhānaṁ channaṁ dhātūnaṁ aṭṭhārasannaṁ dhātūnaṁ dvādasannaṁ āyatanānaṁ dasannaṁ indriyānaṁ nikkhepapaññatti.
ne14:3.1: Kabaḷīkāre ce, bhikkhave, āhāre atthi rāgo atthi nandī atthi taṇhā, patiṭṭhitaṁ tattha viññāṇaṁ virūḷhaṁ.
ne14:3.2: Yattha patiṭṭhitaṁ viññāṇaṁ virūḷhaṁ, atthi tattha nāmarūpassa avakkanti.
ne14:3.3: Yattha atthi nāmarūpassa avakkanti, atthi tattha saṅkhārānaṁ vuddhi.
ne14:3.4: Yattha atthi saṅkhārānaṁ vuddhi, atthi tattha āyatiṁ punabbhavābhinibbatti.
ne14:3.5: Yattha atthi āyatiṁ punabbhavābhinibbatti, atthi tattha āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇaṁ.
ne14:3.6: Yattha atthi āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇaṁ, sasokaṁ taṁ, bhikkhave, sadaraṁ saupāyāsanti vadāmi.
ne14:4.3: Viññāṇe ce, bhikkhave, āhāre atthi rāgo atthi nandī atthi taṇhā, patiṭṭhitaṁ tattha viññāṇaṁ virūḷhaṁ.
ne14:4.4: Yattha patiṭṭhitaṁ viññāṇaṁ virūḷhaṁ, atthi tattha nāmarūpassa avakkanti.
ne14:4.5: Yattha atthi nāmarūpassa avakkanti, atthi tattha saṅkhārānaṁ vuddhi.
ne14:4.6: Yattha atthi saṅkhārānaṁ vuddhi, atthi tattha āyatiṁ punabbhavābhinibbatti.
ne14:4.7: Yattha atthi āyatiṁ punabbhavābhinibbatti, atthi tattha āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇaṁ.
ne14:4.8: Yattha atthi āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇaṁ, sasokaṁ taṁ, bhikkhave, sadaraṁ saupāyāsanti vadāmi.
ne14:4.9: Ayaṁ pabhavapaññatti dukkhassa ca samudayassa ca.
ne14:5.1: Kabaḷīkāre ce, bhikkhave, āhāre natthi rāgo natthi nandī natthi taṇhā, appatiṭṭhitaṁ tattha viññāṇaṁ avirūḷhaṁ.
ne14:5.2: Yattha appatiṭṭhitaṁ viññāṇaṁ avirūḷhaṁ, natthi tattha nāmarūpassa avakkanti.
ne14:5.3: Yattha natthi nāmarūpassa avakkanti, natthi tattha saṅkhārānaṁ vuddhi.
ne14:5.4: Yattha natthi saṅkhārānaṁ vuddhi, natthi tattha āyatiṁ punabbhavābhinibbatti.
ne14:5.5: Yattha natthi āyatiṁ punabbhavābhinibbatti, natthi tattha āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇaṁ.
ne14:5.6: Yattha natthi āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇaṁ, asokaṁ taṁ, bhikkhave, adaraṁ anupāyāsanti vadāmi.
ne14:6.3: Viññāṇe ce, bhikkhave, āhāre natthi rāgo natthi nandī natthi taṇhā, appatiṭṭhitaṁ tattha viññāṇaṁ avirūḷhaṁ.
ne14:6.4: Yattha appatiṭṭhitaṁ viññāṇaṁ avirūḷhaṁ, natthi tattha nāmarūpassa avakkanti.
ne14:6.5: Yattha natthi nāmarūpassa avakkanti, natthi tattha saṅkhārānaṁ vuddhi.
ne14:6.6: Yattha natthi saṅkhārānaṁ vuddhi, natthi tattha āyatiṁ punabbhavābhinibbatti.
ne14:6.7: Yattha natthi āyatiṁ punabbhavābhinibbatti, natthi tattha āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇaṁ.
ne14:6.8: Yattha natthi āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇaṁ, asokaṁ taṁ, bhikkhave, adaraṁ anupāyāsanti vadāmi.
ne14:7.1: Ayaṁ pariññāpaññatti dukkhassa, pahānapaññatti samudayassa, bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa, sacchikiriyāpaññatti nirodhassa.
ne14:8.2: Appamatto nipako sato, samāhito, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
ne14:8.5: “Rūpā aniccā”ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti “cakkhuviññāṇaṁ aniccan”ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
ne14:8.7: Yampidaṁ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā, tampi aniccanti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
ne14:9.9: Yampidaṁ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā, tampi aniccanti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
ne14:10.1: Ayaṁ bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa, pariññāpaññatti dukkhassa, pahānapaññatti samudayassa, sacchikiriyāpaññatti nirodhassa.
ne14:11.1: Rūpaṁ, rādha, vikiratha vidhamatha viddhaṁsetha vikīḷaniyaṁ karotha, paññāya taṇhakkhayāya paṭipajjatha.
ne14:11.5: saṅkhāre viññāṇaṁ vikiratha vidhamatha viddhaṁsetha vikīḷaniyaṁ karotha, paññāya taṇhakkhayāya paṭipajjatha.
ne14:12.1: Ayaṁ nirodhapaññatti nirodhassa, nibbidāpaññatti assādassa, pariññāpaññatti dukkhassa, pahānapaññatti samudayassa, bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa, sacchikiriyāpaññatti nirodhassa.
ne14:13.1: “So idaṁ dukkhan”ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, “ayaṁ dukkhasamudayo”ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, “ayaṁ dukkhanirodho”ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti “ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
ne14:14.1: Ayaṁ paṭivedhapaññatti saccānaṁ, nikkhepapaññatti dassanabhūmiyā, bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa, sacchikiriyāpaññatti sotāpattiphalassa.
ne14:14.2: “So ime āsavā”ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, “ayaṁ āsavasamudayo”ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, “ayaṁ āsavanirodho”ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
ne14:15.1: Ayaṁ uppādapaññatti khaye ñāṇassa, okāsapaññatti anuppāde ñāṇassa, bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa, pariññāpaññatti dukkhassa, pahānapaññatti samudayassa, ārambhapaññatti vīriyindriyassa, āhaṭanāpaññatti āsāṭikānaṁ, nikkhepapaññatti bhāvanābhūmiyā, abhinighātapaññatti pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ.
ne14:16.1: Idaṁ “dukkhan”ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ne14:16.4: Ayaṁ “dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ne14:17.1: Ayaṁ desanāpaññatti saccānaṁ, nikkhepapaññatti sutamayiyā paññāya sacchikiriyāpaññatti anaññātaññassāmītindriyassa, pavattanāpaññatti dhammacakkassa.
ne14:18.1: “Taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhaṁ pariññeyyan”ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ne14:18.2: “So kho panāyaṁ dukkhasamudayo pahātabbo”ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
ne14:18.3: “so kho panāyaṁ dukkhanirodho sacchikātabbo”ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
ne14:18.4: “sā kho panāyaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā bhāvetabbā”ti me, bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ne14:19.1: Ayaṁ bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa, nikkhepapaññatti cintāmayiyā paññāya, sacchikiriyāpaññatti aññindriyassa.
ne14:20.1: “Taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhaṁ pariññātan”ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ne14:20.2: “So kho panāyaṁ dukkhasamudayo pahīno”ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
ne14:20.3: so kho panāyaṁ dukkhanirodho sacchikato”ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
ne14:20.4: “sā kho panāyaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā bhāvitā”ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ne14:21.1: Ayaṁ bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa, nikkhepapaññatti bhāvanāmayiyā paññāya, sacchikiriyāpaññatti aññātāvino indriyassa, pavattanāpaññatti dhammacakkassa.
ne14:23.8: “Abhindi kavacamivattasambhavan”ti abhinibbidāpaññatti cittassa, upādānapaññatti sabbaññutāya, padālanāpaññatti avijjaṇḍakosānaṁ.
ne14:25.1: **“Yo dukkhan”**ti vevacanapaññatti ca dukkhassa pariññāpaññatti ca.
ne14:25.4: **“Kāmesu so jantu kathaṁ nameyyā”**ti vevacanapaññatti ca kāmataṇhāya abhinivesapaññatti ca.
ne14:25.5: **“Kāmā hi loke saṅgoti ñatvā”**ti paccatthikato dassanapaññatti kāmānaṁ.
ne14:25.6: Kāmā hi aṅgārakāsūpamā maṁsapesūpamā pāvakakappā papātauragopamā ca.
ne14:25.7: **“Tesaṁ satīmā”**ti apacayapaññatti pahānāya, nikkhepapaññatti kāyagatāya satiyā, bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa.
ne14:25.10: Yadā hi yogī kāmā saṅgoti pajānāti.
ne14:25.11: So kāmānaṁ anuppādāya kusale dhamme uppādayati, so anuppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ uppādāya vāyamati.
ne14:25.14: Tattha so uppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ ṭhitiyā vāyamatīti ayaṁ appamādapaññatti bhāvanāya, nikkhepapaññatti vīriyindriyassa, ārakkhapaññatti kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ, ṭhitipaññatti adhicittasikkhāya.
ne14:27.3: **“Upadhibandhano bālo”**ti pabhavapaññatti pāpakānaṁ icchāvacarānaṁ, kiccapaññatti pariyuṭṭhānānaṁ.
ne14:27.7: **“Assirī viya khāyatī”**ti dassanapaññatti dibbacakkhussa, nikkhepapaññatti paññācakkhussa.
ne14:27.8: **“Passato natthi kiñcanan”**ti paṭivedhapaññatti sattānaṁ, rāgo kiñcanaṁ doso kiñcanaṁ moho kiñcanaṁ.
ne14:28.1: “Atthi, bhikkhave, ajātaṁ abhūtaṁ akataṁ asaṅkhataṁ, no cetaṁ, bhikkhave, abhavissa ajātaṁ abhūtaṁ akataṁ asaṅkhataṁ.
ne14:28.2: Nayidha jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṁ paññāyetha.
ne14:28.3: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi ajātaṁ abhūtaṁ akataṁ asaṅkhataṁ, tasmā jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṁ paññāyatī”ti.
ne14:29.1: “No cetaṁ, bhikkhave, abhavissa ajātaṁ abhūtaṁ akataṁ asaṅkhatan”ti desanāpaññatti nibbānassa vevacanapaññatti ca.
ne14:29.2: “Nayidha jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṁ paññāyethā”ti vevacanapaññatti saṅkhatassa upanayanapaññatti ca.
ne14:29.3: “Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi ajātaṁ abhūtaṁ akataṁ asaṅkhatan”ti vevacanapaññatti nibbānassa jotanāpaññatti ca.
ne14:29.4: “Tasmā jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṁ paññāyatī”ti ayaṁ vevacanapaññatti nibbānassa, niyyānikapaññatti maggassa, nissaraṇapaññatti saṁsārato.
ne14:29.6: Tenāha āyasmā mahākaccāyano “ekaṁ bhagavā dhammaṁ, paññattīhi vividhāhi desetī”ti.
